column4: I just tried installing Virtualbox from the .deb file I downloaded from their web site.  It gave me an error message saying "Same version is available in a software channel: You are recommended to install the software from the channel instead."  What is this software channel it's talking about?
is it bad to install it with the file?
By doing that, you won't get any updates, you should use the stuff in the repositories when you get a chance.
